content.question: Pliny’s relationship with Harpocras, known as patronage, involves

choices.label: daily communication between the two men concerning politics
Pliny freeing Harpocras after he reaches a certain age
mutual benefits despite an imbalance in social power
Pliny’s power of life and death over Harpocras

content.answer: mutual benefits despite an imbalance in social power

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
